K12bsu003_u:2: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharatisma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā
K12bsu003_u:4: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśrīyāṃ kumārabhūtām āmantrayate sma /
K12bsu003_u:6: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānāṃ
K12bsu003_u:11: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvastasyāparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇavarṇaparikīrtana nāma
K12bsu003_u:12: dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheyamātram api śroṣyanti yāvat pustakagatām
K12bsu003_u:14: samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjāyiṣyanti te parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ punaraiva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu003_u:15: ye khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ sattvastasyāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścita tejorājasya tathāgatasya nāmoṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
K12bsu003_u:17: ye parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti teṣām apyāyurvivardhayiṣyati // 3 //
K12bsu003_u:18: tasmāttarhi mañjuśrīdirghāyuṣkatvaṃ prārthayitukāmaḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā
K12bsu003_u:19: tasyāparimitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti teṣām ime
K12bsu003_u:21: om namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya,
K12bsu003_u:24: om sarvasaṃskāra pariśuddhadharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvapariśuddhe mahānayāparivāre svāhā // 5 //
K12bsu003_u:25: imāṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatasya nāmoṣṭottaraśataṃ ye kecil likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti pustakagatām api kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
K12bsu003_u:30: tena khalu punaḥ samayena navanavatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 7 //
K12bsu003_u:32: tena khalu punaḥ samayena caturaśītīnāṃ Buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 8 //
K12bsu003_u:34: tena khalu punaḥ samayena saptasaptatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 9 //
K12bsu003_u:36: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 10 //
K12bsu003_u:38: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcapañcaśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 11 //
K12bsu003_u:40: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcacatvāriśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 12 //
K12bsu003_u:42: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ṣaṭtriṃśatīnāṃ Buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 13 //
K12bsu003_u:44: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaviṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 14 //
K12bsu003_u:46: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 15 //
K12bsu003_u:48: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa na kadācinnarakeṣūpapadyate na tīryagyonau na yamaloke na akṣaṇeṣu ca kadācid api upapasyate
K12bsu003_u:50: tatra tatra sarvatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyanti // 17 //
K12bsu003_u:52: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi likhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti // 18 //
K12bsu003_u:54: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasrāṇi kārāpitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti // 19 //
K12bsu003_u:56: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇāni parikṣayaṃ gacchanti // 20 //
K12bsu003_u:58: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
K12bsu003_u:59: tasya na māro na mārakāyikā na yakṣa na rākṣasā nākālamṛtyurevatāraṃ lapsyante // 22 //
K12bsu003_u:61: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
K12bsu003_u:62: tasya maraṇakālasamaye navanavatayo buddhakoṭyaḥ sammukhaṃ darśanaṃ dāsyanti,
K12bsu003_u:65: nātra kāṅkṣā na vicikitsā na vimātirutpādayitavyā // 23 //
K12bsu003_u:67: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
K12bsu003_u:68: tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyanti // 24 //
K12bsu003_u:70: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau amitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre upapadyate // 25 //
K12bsu003_u:72: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
K12bsu003_u:74: yeṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ mṛgapakṣīnāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodhau abhisambodhim abhisambhotsyante // 26 //
K12bsu003_u:76: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya strībhāvo na kadācid api bhaviṣyati // 27 //
K12bsu003_u:78: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyam uddiśya ekam api kārṣāpaṇaṃ dānaṃ dāsyati,
K12bsu003_u:79: tena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati // 28 //
K12bsu003_u:84: yathā vipaśviśikhiviśvabhukrakucchandakanakamunikāśyapaśākyamuniprabhṛtīnāṃ tathāgatānāṃ saptaratnamayaḥ pūjāḥ kṛtvā tasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ,
K12bsu003_u:85: na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum // 30 //
K12bsu003_u:87: yathā sumeroḥ parvatarājasya samānāṃ ratnarāśiṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt,
K12bsu003_u:89: na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum // 31 //
K12bsu003_u:93: na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum // 32 //
K12bsu003_u:95: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati saṃskṛtya pūjayiṣyati tena daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sarvatathāgatā vanditāḥ pūjitāśca bhaviṣyanti // 33 //
K12bsu003_u:98: dānabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 34 //
K12bsu003_u:100: śīlabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 35 //
K12bsu003_u:102: kṣāntibalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 36 //
K12bsu003_u:104: vīryabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 37 //
K12bsu003_u:106: dhyānabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 38 //
K12bsu003_u:108: prajñābalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 39 //
K12bsu003_u:110: idam vocadbhagavān āttamanaste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattva mahāsattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanam iti // 40 //
